changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `prodlims`.`lv_sample_disease` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `lv_sample_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `disease_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `UKLVSAMPLEDISEASE_idx` (`lv_sample_id`,`disease_id`), KEY `FKLVSDSAMPLEID_idx` (`lv_sample_id`), KEY `FKLVSDDISEASEID_idx` (`disease_id`), CONSTRAINT `FKLVSDSAMPLEID_idx` FOREIGN KEY (`lv_sample_id`) REFERENCES `prodlims`.`lv_sample` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `FKLVSDDISEASEID_idx` FOREIGN KEY (`disease_id`) REFERENCES `prodlims`.`horizondisease` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
